last_episode_to_air.name: Our Love Story
last_episode_to_air.overview: With her son's best interest in mind, Hui-ja makes a sudden decision. Yeon-ha makes his feelings clear to Wan. Seok-gyun shows Jeong-a he's changed.

name: Dear My Friends
overview: Life is ever-delightful — and ever-challenging — for a group of friends in their twilight years as they rediscover themselves through love and family.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Life is ever-delightful — and ever-challenging — for a group of friends in their twilight years as they rediscover themselves through love and family.

tagline: A story of today, the youngest day of their lives.

episodes.name: Sorry, I Am Not Curious About You Guys
episodes.overview: Cho Hui-ja leaves behind a comfortable but lonely life in the Philippines for Korea, where her friends are preparing to attend a reunion.

episodes.name: I Can Do It Alone. I Can Live Alone.
episodes.overview: Jang Nan-hui and Lee Yeong-won bicker over a decades-old grudge. Hui-ja is bothered by what her friends think about how her husband died.

episodes.name: Down To The Braless Street With A Torn Jeans
episodes.overview: At the police station, Yeong-won saves the day. Later, everyone gathers at a photographer's studio to have their portraits taken.

episodes.name: Please, I Beg Everyone, Don't Do Like As You Don't Know Us.
episodes.overview: A horrible accident leaves Hui-ja and Moon Jeong-a shaken. The day after Park Wan brings them home, she realizes something is seriously wrong.

episodes.name: Do Not Be Lonely. I Am Beside You.
episodes.overview: Oh Choong-nam feels her heart skip a beat as she helps Lee Seong-jae shop for a party at his house. Yeong-won reveals a painful secret to Nan-hui.

episodes.name: The Way You Can Return, The Way You Can Not Return
episodes.overview: The brutal truth about Kim Sun-yeong's marriage overwhelms her parents. Choong-nam considers telling Nan-hui about what she saw Wan doing.

episodes.name: The Wind Blows. The Waves Are Hitting.
episodes.overview: While grieving for her mother, Jeong-a becomes determined to live for herself. Wan chats with Seo Yeon-ha about the woman he's met.

episodes.name: As If Nothing Had Happened
episodes.overview: An earnest request from Seong-jae triggers Choong-nam's anger. Jeong-a informs her friends about her intent to leave Seok-gyun.

episodes.name: Life Is Really Very Beautiful, Isn't It?
episodes.overview: Wan and Nan-hui tearfully confront their painful past. Finally able to go on his trip with Hui-ja, Seong-jae takes them down memory lane.

episodes.name: Honing the Sword of Revenge (1)
episodes.overview: Seok-gyun remains oblivious as Jeong-a makes up her mind. Wan's impulse trip to see Yeon-ha leads to a frank conversation about unkept promises.

episodes.name: Honing the Sword of Revenge (2)
episodes.overview: Seok-gyun convinces himself that Jeong-a will return in a few days. Choong-nam plots her revenge against those who take advantage of her.

episodes.name: What I Was Aware Of, A Hundred of My Sins. What I Was Unaware Of, Tons of My Sins.
episodes.overview: Yeong-won agrees to meet an ex-husband. Starting to realize his wrongdoings through the past few decades, Seok-gyun calls Wan to tell her his story.

episodes.name: Like a Mother to the End, Like a Fighter to the End (1)
episodes.overview: While fearfully awaiting news that could change her life, Nan-hui runs into her crush. Seong-jae worries about Hui-ja's worsening condition.

episodes.name: Like a Mother to the End, Like a Fighter to the End (2)
episodes.overview: The friends search for a missing Hui-ja. A fearful Nan-hui finds company in Yeong-won and Wan as she processes the next steps after her diagnosis.

episodes.name: When Did We Ever Look at You This Long?
episodes.overview: Before her surgery, Nan-hui pays a visit to her mother. Jeong-a and Hui-ja share a tender moment. Wan makes a call that breaks her heart.

episodes.name: Our Love Story
episodes.overview: With her son's best interest in mind, Hui-ja makes a sudden decision. Yeon-ha makes his feelings clear to Wan. Seok-gyun shows Jeong-a he's changed.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Life is ever-delightful — and ever-challenging — for a group of friends in their twilight years as they rediscover themselves through love and family.
